module.name: Queues
module.description: Creates a queue where calls are placed on hold and answered on a first-in, first-out basis. Many options are available, including ring strategy for agents, caller announcements, max wait times, etc.
module.changelog: *2.8.0.4* #4671 *2.8.0.3* localization updates *2.8.0.2* #4327 *2.8.0.1* #4297 *2.8.0.0* #4165, #4187, #4279, #4280, #2203 *2.7.0.2* #4120 again fixed typo in variable name *2.7.0.1* #4120, spelling typo *2.7.0.0* #4084, spelling, tooltips changes, localizations *2.7.0beta1.5* #4084, #4068 (support for experimental dial-one) *2.7.0beta1.4* #4051 (requires MoH 2.7.0.0 or above) *2.7.0beta1.3* #4048 *2.7.0beta1.2* #4038 *2.7.0beta1.1* #2085 *2.7.0beta1.0* #3594 *2.6.0.3* #3945,#3984 *2.6.0.2* #3794, #3496, #3562 (with use of USEQUEUESTATE=yes and Asterisk patch: 15168 *2.6.0.1* #3044 (add per device queue login/blf enabled toggle feature code) *2.6.0.0* #3546, #2768, #3685, #3686 *2.5.4.8* #3664 *2.5.4.7* #3618, localization udpates *2.5.4.6* localization updates *2.5.4.5* #3400, #3380, various translations *2.5.4.4* #3242, #3230, localization fixes *2.5.4.3* #3222 sqlite3 *2.5.4.2* #3200 and localization string fixes *2.5.4.1* #3171 and localize queues_timeString() *2.5.4* #3138, #3147 add the Queues App n option as Retry alternative, see tooltip *2.5.3* #3098 WARNING: subtle queue behavior might change: set persistenetmembers=yes so dynamic agents are retained on asterisk restarting, and added option for autofill *2.5.2.4* #3069 add queue weight option to queues *2.5.2.3* #3083, setting ringinuse causes transfered call to keep agent as unavailable, removing since it is not needed for FreePBX standard agents *2.5.2.2* #2987, #3010 sqlite3 install script, spelling *2.5.2.1* #2970 periodic-announce message not being configured (re #2068 change) *2.5.2* #2073 add a Queue hold time CID prepend to report how long the caller has been holding *2.5.1* #2068 recordings_id, don't list IVRs with compound messages *2.5.0.1* #2875, #2768 *2.5.0.0* #2976 Add Optional Regex to filter user agent numbers that they can input *2.4.0.8* #2757 allow spaces and other alphanumeric characters in description *2.4.0.7* #2604, #2707, #2843 fix mal-formed html tags, typo, Russian Translation, add oldstyle module hook *2.4.0.6* added depends on 2.4.0 *2.4.0.5* #2637, monitor-join=yes not supported in asterisk 1.6 *2.4.0.4* #2636 Queues Options member status allways show No *2.4.0.3* #2579 added strict to joinempty and leavewhenempy, #2627 ringing box ignored *2.4.0.2* #2528 add context = 'ext-queues' when getting destination statement *2.4.0.1* added out() and outn() to install script *2.4.0* Migration from legacy tables, added queues_conf class, Extension/dest registry, #2282, #2487, it translations *2.4.0* CHANGELOG TRUNCATED See SVN Repository
